history.proof: unfold sum_n. qsimpl use: sum_n_m_S. srun best use: Nat.le_0_l, sum_n_Sm.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sum_n_m_S (sum_n_m (fun n : nat => _ (S n)) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment G : AbelianGroup H : forall (a : nat -> G) (n m : nat), sum_n_m (fun n0 : nat => a (S n0)) n m = sum_n_m a (S n) (S m) a : nat -> G n : nat Unable to unify "plus (sum_n_m a 0 n) (a (S n))" with "sum_n_m a 0 (S n)".

original: unfold sum_n. fold sum_n. rewrite sum_n_m_S. reflexivity.
